posts.content:
Hi what's is the correct size belt for my 1641 twin port with dynamo? Is it 10mm x 900mm and should it be toothed? Thanks phil

Sent from my SM-J320FN using Tapatalk

the best belt you can buy

http://www.machine7.com/product.php?xProd=2980

Thanks for your help that looks like the business is will order a couple. Thanks Phil

Sent from my SM-J320FN using Tapatalk

readyboy61 wrote:the best belt you can buy

http://www.machine7.com/product.php?xProd=2980
WHS!
Optibelt all the way.
Be careful though as different pulley wheel sizes and alternator/dynamo sizes can affect things quite a bit.
On my bay an 888mm belt is best and on my split a 900 or 905 fits better (can't remember which) and they are both the same on paper lol
Either way, Optibelt do a variety of sizes so should be fine and the quality is very good as it's a V belt.
Good luck!
DD

Stock factory belt for Dynamo was 9.5 x 905 (pt no: 111 903 137D) - interesting that the Optibelt sold by M7 above is 11.5mm thickness instead of 9.5 x 912 - so must ride much higher in the pulleys - may have to try one of those as I'm running no shims currently to keep my belt tight enough and that's with a C&C 906 belt.....
